title: 求OP刷钱指令
author: hanbi401
txt_content: 有没有人知道OP刷钱指令的知道的回我

replies.author: gjuoun
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

输入：/give (你的游戏名) (物品ID) (数量)
如我要64个火炬的话：/give caocao 50 64

replies.author: hanbi401
replies.txt_content:
Condor 发表于 2012-6-23 11:38 
/give 名字 money 钱数
没用~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`

replies.author: hanbi401
replies.txt_content:
gjuoun 发表于 2012-6-23 18:37 
/money give ID 金钱
谢啦~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
